CustomField.formula: "dati al: " & IF( AND( DAY(CRM_DataAggiornamentoStock__c) <= 9, MONTH(CRM_DataAggiornamentoStock__c) <= 9 ), "0" & TEXT( DAY(CRM_DataAggiornamentoStock__c)) & "/" & "0" & TEXT(MONTH(CRM_DataAggiornamentoStock__c)) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR(CRM_DataAggiornamentoStock__c)), IF( DAY(CRM_DataAggiornamentoStock__c) <= 9, "0" & TEXT( DAY(CRM_DataAggiornamentoStock__c)) & "/" & TEXT(MONTH(CRM_DataAggiornamentoStock__c)) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR(CRM_DataAggiornamentoStock__c)), IF( MONTH(CRM_DataAggiornamentoStock__c) <= 9, TEXT( DAY(CRM_DataAggiornamentoStock__c)) & "/" & "0" & TEXT(MONTH(CRM_DataAggiornamentoStock__c)) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR(CRM_DataAggiornamentoStock__c)), TEXT( DAY(CRM_DataAggiornamentoStock__c)) & "/" & TEXT(MONTH(CRM_DataAggiornamentoStock__c)) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR(CRM_DataAggiornamentoStock__c)) )))
CustomField.label: Data Tabella Stock
